Description: Fragment of wall of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; wholly glazed Incised inscription on inside.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 98)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 704, no. 621) (He has 1911,0606.15 as his number 525, in error)
Höckmann & Möller 2006 / The Hellenion at Naukratis: Questions and Observations (p.16, no.68)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1729)
